In addition to the free coffee and tea, the room also has 4 free bottles of water ( 2 bottles outside and 2 bottles in the refrigerator), very nice, in other hotels, only 2 bottles. The room has a window overlooking the street, which is not beautiful but is right in the wind and has plenty of space to look at the sky, very enjoyable.
